Text: sound is way too low, avoid it

The sound is a little low, but that was easily solved by turning the TV up a bit. I've had several other downloads that were equally quiet.

Excellent quality otherwise. The only complaint I've ever been able to make about ettv's torrents are that they contain more than just the video file so I end up having to go delete all that crap once I'm done seeding. But I can deal with that to get high quality AVIs since eztv and VTV have started focusing on MP4s which PS3 Media Server hates for some reason.
Thanks for uploading it in a usable format and not fucking 264 or mkv bollocks
